detail_desc: Shorts in washed denim with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Ankle-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric. High waist with buttons, and buttons and a slit at the front. Lined.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Wide blouse in a viscose weave with a wide neckline with smocking at the top. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Painted metal water bottle with a plastic screw top. Capacity 500 ml.
Cable-knit polo-neck collar in a soft cotton blend containing some wool. Fleece lining front and back.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Trousers in a softly draping, patterned weave made partly from recycled polyester. High waist with gathered elastication at the sides, diagonal side pockets, a low crotch and straight, wide legs.
Sleeveless, gently fitted body in stretch microfibre with a halterneck and stand-up collar. Small opening with concealed buttons at the back of the neck, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Checked shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. A discreet press-stud at each side, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide jumper in a sturdy rib knit with a turtle neck and wide raglan sleeves.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long, sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with smocking at the top and narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (in sizes 0-12M).
Sleeveless top in soft organic cotton jersey with a tie detail at the hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Patterned skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hem.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the hem of the skirt for added volume. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose and cotton blend with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered, elasticated frill around the neckline and armholes.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a V-shaped, mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Sleeveless mesh dress with embroidered reversible sequins (normal sequins in size 2-3Y) with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Lined.

V-neck blouse in jacquard-weave viscose with a wrapover front that fastens with concealed ties, a hook-and-eye fastener and narrow ties at one side. Long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Blouse in an embroidered viscose weave with a V-neck and tasselled tie at the front, 3/4-length sleeves with trumpet cuffs and a seam at the hem with a flounce.

Car coat in woven fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms, long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined with taped seams inside.
Long metal earrings with plastic beads. Length approx. 7.5 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and a smocked seam under the bust.

Suit trousers in dobby-weave wool with a concealed button, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Relaxed fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Dungaree dress in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with crossover straps that can be adjusted with press-studs at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in a printed crêpe weave with pleats at the shoulders, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back..

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with a racer back and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a stand-up collar, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Pull-on trousers in sturdy, patterned jersey made from a viscose blend with an elasticated waist and gently flared legs.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a jersey-lined hood with appliqués at the top, a zip down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Set with a sports top and short tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Straight-cut top with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Tights with a panel at the waist.
Long-sleeved body in velour with a low-cut back, hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy cotton twill with a collar, metal buttons down the front, a yoke and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.
Shirt in an airy linen weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a rounded collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous sleeves finishing with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned mesh. Draped bodice with pleats at the sides, a seam at the waist and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey-lined bodice and jersey underskirt.

Shirt in soft, washed denim with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft,organic cotton jersey leggings in different designs with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with buttons on one shoulder, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Knee-length A-line skirt in imitation leather. High waist with press-studs and a concealed zip at one side, and decorative seams front and back. Unlined.

Cotton twill jacket with badges, printed text and a stand-up collar with a zip. Zip down the front, wind flap with concealed press-studs, chest pockets and flap front pockets with a button. Decorative shoulder tabs and buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Short skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
Short dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, one fake back pocket and elasticated hems.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless playsuit in sturdy slub jersey with a wrapover top and wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Sports gloves with mesh uppers, silicone stripes on the palms for optimum grip, and elasticated cuffs.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short puff sleeves and straight-cut hem.
Leggings in patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and 3/4-length legs.
Short jacket in washed, patterned denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Pleated satin skirt with a wrapover front, ties at one side and concealed buttons in the waistband. Lined.
5-pocket joggers in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, decorative drawstring. zip fly and button and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
